issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Currently the usage of the command {{hdfs zkfc -formatZK}} is not concrete. The introduction of parameters  {{-force}}, {{-nonInteractive}} is missing in documentation and the help message. Actually, the function of these are very similar to namenode format. We should update these since it will let users know how to use this command easily.
fields.summary: Document the missing options of hdfs zkfc command

comments.body:
Attach the patch. The new output infos:
{code}
Usage: hdfs zkfc [ -formatZK [-force] [-nonInteractive] ]
	-force: formats the znode if the znode exists.
	-nonInteractive: formats the znode aborts if the znode exists,
	unless -force option is specified.
{code}
Thanks for the review.
